name: Blobfusion
description:
After the most unfortunate discovery in all history of Blobkind, breathing an unknown, foul and dense smoke, Jordan has become the most feared and powerful Dark Blob ever. Turning against his friends and family, his only objective is to contaminate the planet and destroy everything around. 

Four brave Blobs have made their lives a mission to save the world, using their bond to build energy, evolve and reach, maybe, a magic Form ancient Blobs say could overpower anything !

The bond between the players is represented by a incorporeal Light Beam. The Blobs can't themselves attack something as evil as Jordan but by bonding and then nourishing the link, they will develop their weapon, Barry. Barry is able to attack Jordan with the almighty sum of all the Blob's power, and he can also resurrect other players, but he is vulnerable to Jordan's attacks.

When the Bond is at his strongest, try an Ancient Ritual Incantation with B, and hope for the best.

How to Play :

4 players only (for now)
GamePad supported

Left Stick = Move
X = Nourishing the Bond
B = Ancient Ritual Incantation, when Bond Energy is at maximum !
